entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
